EPalWazaID::AcidRain.description: Creates acidic clouds that pour down acid rain on enemies.

EPalWazaID::AirBlade.description: Sends out sharp blades of air in a fan shape.

EPalWazaID::AirCanon.description: Quickly fires a burst of highly pressurized air.

EPalWazaID::Apocalypse.description: Generates several dark vortexes around the enemy.

EPalWazaID::AquaJet.description: Hurls a high speed ball of water at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::BeamSlicer.description: Mows down the frontal area with a beam imbued with dragon power. The area strucked by the beam will also explode after short delay.

EPalWazaID::BlastCanon.description: Fires an energy bullet imbued with dragon power at the enemy's location. Upon impact, the bullet shatters and creates a frontal long-range explosion.

EPalWazaID::BlizzardLance.description: Summons a sharp ice lance under an enemy.

EPalWazaID::BubbleShot.description: Fires numerous bubbles that slowly pursue an enemy.

EPalWazaID::BubbleShower.description: Focuses energy into the body and scatters poison orbs in all directions.

EPalWazaID::ChargeCanon.description: Fires an energy orb infused with draconic power at the enemy. The orb causes a wide-area explosion upon impact.

EPalWazaID::Commet.description: Drops a meteorite straight down, generating a shock wave around the impact area.

EPalWazaID::CommetRain.description: Drops countless meteorites, generating an array of shock waves.

EPalWazaID::CrossThunder.description: Generates two lightning bolts that advance left and right, blocking either direction.

EPalWazaID::CrossWind.description: Conjures blades of wind in front of the enemy, converging to deliver a cutting cross attack.

EPalWazaID::DarkArrow.description: Fires off dark energy that homes in on an enemy.

EPalWazaID::DarkBall.description: Unleashes a sphere of darkness that slowly tracks down an enemy.

EPalWazaID::DarkCanon.description: Hurls an energy ball imbued with dark energy at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::DarkLaser.description: Charges dark energy before blasting enemies with a powerful beam.

EPalWazaID::DarkLegion.description: Fires a menacing ball of dark energy that pursues enemies.

EPalWazaID::DarkPulse.description: Fires high-speed dark orbs in a fan shape, spreading as they travel.

EPalWazaID::DarkWave.description: Quickly discharges dark energy, damaging those around it.

EPalWazaID::DiamondFall.description: Creates numerous lumps of ice that are consecutively dropped on a foe's head.

EPalWazaID::DiversionLaser.description: Fires a high-pressure stream of water forward. After a short delay, the stream branches off to the left and right.

EPalWazaID::DoubleIcicleThrow.description: Creates two huge ice blocks and fires them at the enemy one after another. On impact, it also shocks those close by.

EPalWazaID::DragonBreath.description: Exhales breath imbued with draconic energy, dealing continuous damage to those in front of it.

EPalWazaID::DragonCanon.description: Hurls an energy ball imbued with draconic energy at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::DragonMeteor.description: Summons numerous small meteorites and launches them at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::DragonWave.description: Quickly discharges draconic energy, damaging those around it.

EPalWazaID::ElecWave.description: Quickly discharges electricity, shocking those around it.

EPalWazaID::Eruption.description: Fires countless volcanic bombs into the sky. After a while, the bombs rain down around their originator.

EPalWazaID::FireBall.description: Creates a giant ball of flame and hurls it at an enemy. The ball explodes over a wide area upon impact.

EPalWazaID::FireBlast.description: Hurls a ball of fire straight at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::FireSeed.description: Shoots fireballs towards an enemy. The fireballs explode after a short distance, generating smaller fireballs that spread forward.

EPalWazaID::FlameFunnel.description: Creates multiple spheres of fiery energy, from which countless fireballs shoot towards the enemy.

EPalWazaID::FlameWall.description: Creates a wall of flames at the enemy's location. The wall of flames will remain for a while, and deal damage to the enemies it touches.

EPalWazaID::Flamethrower.description: Shoots flames at an enemy, dealing continuous damage.

EPalWazaID::FlareArrow.description: Fires three flaming arrows in succession that home in on an enemy.

EPalWazaID::FlareTornado.description: Generates two flaming tornadoes on either side before launching them at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::FlareTwister.description: Creates multiple flame tornadoes. The tornado continues to spin in circles.

EPalWazaID::FrostBreath.description: Enshrouds an enemy in a frigid blast of air, dealing continuous damage.

EPalWazaID::GhostFlame.description: Fires three balls of malice that relentlessly pursue an enemy.

EPalWazaID::GrassTornado.description: Generates two tornadoes on either side before launching them at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::GravityShot.description: Fires a dark energy projectile that accelerates over time.

EPalWazaID::HolyBlast.description: Creates a wide explosion of light at the enemy's location and around it.

EPalWazaID::Human_Punch.description: Punch with conviction; believe in the power of the fist.

EPalWazaID::HydroPump.description: Shoots pressurized water at extreme velocities, sweeping over a wide area in front of it.

EPalWazaID::HydroSlicer.description: Mows down the frontal area with a blast of compressed water. The area struck by the blast erupts with water after a short delay.

EPalWazaID::HyperBeam.description: Charges destructive energy before firing a high-powered beam forward across a wide area.

EPalWazaID::IceAge.description: Throws icicles in a wide area from under the enemy's feet.

EPalWazaID::IceBlade.description: Creates a crescent blade of ice and hurls it forward.

EPalWazaID::IceMissile.description: Creates ice lances in the air that fly towards enemies.

EPalWazaID::IceWall.description: Creates a wall of ice that rises from the ground. The ice wall remains standing for a while, and breaks after taking enough damage.

EPalWazaID::IcicleLine.description: Generates pillars of ice that move in a straight line in three directions.

EPalWazaID::IciclePierce.description: Generates multiple sharp ice blocks in the sky and fires them at the enemy.

EPalWazaID::IcicleThrow.description: Creates a giant lump of ice and hurls it at an enemy. It deals damage to those in the surrounding area upon impact.

EPalWazaID::Inferno.description: Infuses the surrounding ground with energy, causing it to explode after a set amount of time.

EPalWazaID::LightningStrike.description: Acts as a lightning rod, calling down thunderbolts that electrocute the surrounding area.

EPalWazaID::LineGeyser.description: Generates a column of water that travels in a straight line.

EPalWazaID::LineThunder.description: Generates a lightning bolt that moves forward in a line.

EPalWazaID::LockonLaser.description: Takes aim at an enemy before firing a super high speed laser.

EPalWazaID::MudShot.description: Hurls sticky mud at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::PoisonFog.description: Generates a fog of poison in front, causing the opponent to become poisoned.

EPalWazaID::PoisonShot.description: Hurls poison sludge at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::PowerBall.description: Charges a massive amount of energy before firing a large destructive ball.

EPalWazaID::PowerShot.description: Charges energy into a focused blast.

EPalWazaID::Psychokinesis.description: Utilizes psychokinesis to grab enemies before flinging them to the ground from above.

EPalWazaID::RaidCutter.description: Shoots countless wind swords that fly straight towards the enemy.

EPalWazaID::Railbolt.description: Charge the power of lightning to the limit and fires multiple simultaneous electric shocks at the enemy.

EPalWazaID::RangeThunder.description: Generates lightning strikes that travel in a straight line in all directions.

EPalWazaID::ReflectiveShuriken.description: Launches a blade of wind that rebounds off enemies or trees, striking repeatedly. Can ricochet up to four times.

EPalWazaID::RipTide.description: Generates waves that surge around the enemy from all sides. They converge and explode at the center, erupting into a column of water.

EPalWazaID::RockBeat.description: Shakes the ground and lifts a massive boulder into the air.

EPalWazaID::RockLance.description: Generates a sharp rock spear under an enemy.

EPalWazaID::RootAttack.description: Generates spiny thorns that chase an enemy along the ground, piercing them from below.

EPalWazaID::RootLance.description: Sprouts sharp roots in and around the enemy's location.

EPalWazaID::SandTornado.description: Generates two sand tornadoes on either side before launching them at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::SandTwister.description: Creates multiple sand tornadoes. The tornadoes continuously spin in circles.

EPalWazaID::SeaGush.description: Erupts massive pillars of water beneath and around the enemy.

EPalWazaID::SeedMachinegun.description: Fires a volley of hard seeds at enemies in front of it.

EPalWazaID::SeedMine.description: Launches a deadly seed. If it hits an enemy, the seed explodes.

EPalWazaID::SelfDestruct.description: Risks its life to cause a violent explosion. Becomes incapacitated afterwards.

EPalWazaID::SelfDestruct_Bee.description: Risks its life to cause a violent explosion, but receives the honor of falling in battle.

EPalWazaID::SelfExplosion.description: Risks life to cause a massive explosion. Those who perish for their duty become glistening stars in the night sky.

EPalWazaID::ShadowBall.description: Creates a giant ball of darkness and hurls it at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::ShokeiLaser.description: After aiming at the enemy, fires multiple ultra-fast lightning lasers.

EPalWazaID::SolarBeam.description: Charges solar energy before blasting enemies with a powerful beam.

EPalWazaID::SpecialCutter.description: The user fires three high-speed blades of wind in quick succession that fly straight at enemies.

EPalWazaID::SpreadPulse.description: Releases lightning orbs in a fan shape, spreading as they travel.

EPalWazaID::StarMine.description: Generates stars around the enemy that explode on contact. Stars also explode after some time.

EPalWazaID::StoneShotgun.description: Fires a barrage of stones forward.

EPalWazaID::ThreeCommet.description: Drops meteorites one after another, generating shock waves around the impact areas.

EPalWazaID::ThreeThunder.description: Generates lightning that strikes an enemy three times from above.

EPalWazaID::ThrowRock.description: Digs up a boulder and hurls it at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::ThunderBall.description: Fires an electric ball that slowly pursues an enemy.

EPalWazaID::ThunderFunnel.description: Creates two balls of electric energy that fire numerous lightning orbs at enemies.

EPalWazaID::ThunderRain.description: Calls lightning that strikes an enemy after a set amount of time has passed.

EPalWazaID::ThunderSpear.description: Fires a high-speed lightning spear straight ahead towards the enemy.

EPalWazaID::ThunderStorm.description: Generates a huge tornado of lightning that moves slowly towards the enemy.

EPalWazaID::Thunderbolt.description: Charges electric energy before blasting enemies with a powerful shock.

EPalWazaID::Tremor.description: Causes the ground to shake before hurling a massive stone mass at its surroundings.

EPalWazaID::TriSpark.description: A high-speed lightning ball that flies in a straight line. Simultaneously fires slow lightning balls that track the enemy.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Alpaca_Tackle.description: Melpaca's exclusive skill. Charges forward while surrounded by an adorable aura.

EPalWazaID::Unique_AmaterasuWolf_Dark_Da.description: Kitsun Noct's exclusive skill. Charges forward with great speed while enveloped in intense purple flames.

EPalWazaID::Unique_AmaterasuWolf_FireCha.description: Kitsun's exclusive skill. Charges forward with great speed while enveloped in intense blue flames.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Anubis_GroundPunch.description: Anubis' exclusive skill. Leaps high into the air and strikes a punch to the ground, causing a shockwave that deals damge over a wide area.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Anubis_LowRoundKick.description: Anubis' exclusive skill. Performs a spin kick with its strong legs, sweeping enemies over a wide area.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Anubis_Tackle.description: Anubis' exclusive skill. Rapidly pursues its foes while releasing energy and unleashing a powerful punch.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Baphomet_SwallowKite.description: Incineram's exclusive skill. Draws near enemies using its left claw to slash them into the air before cutting them down with its right claw.

EPalWazaID::Unique_BirdDragon_FireBreath.description: Vanwyrms exclusive skill. Advances while breathing fire from its mouth.

EPalWazaID::Unique_BirdDragon_Ice_IceBre.description: Vanwyrm Cryst's exclusive skill. Advances while exhaling cold air from its mouth.

EPalWazaID::Unique_BlackCentaur_TwoSpear.description: Necromus' exclusive skill. Clads its twin spears with vicious whirlwinds and charges forward, thrusting them one after the other.

EPalWazaID::Unique_BlackGriffon_TackleLa.description: Charges forward, generating orbs of light that automatically target enemies and unleash a barrage of lasers.
Shadowbeak's exclusive skill. As it charges forward, emits countless blue rays that automatically locate and pursue the enemy.

EPalWazaID::Unique_BlackMetalDragon_Fire.description: Astegon's exclusive skill. After throwing two punches forward, it exhales a dragon breath downward.

EPalWazaID::Unique_BlueThunderHorse_Flas.description: Azurmane's exclusive skill. Moves with the speed of lightning, engulfing everything in its path.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Boar_Tackle.description: Rushoar's exclusive skill. Takes aim at a foe and rushes at them with a fierce charge.

EPalWazaID::Unique_CaptainPenguin_Black_.description: Penking Lux's exclusive skill. Lies on its belly while generating electric charge all around it before sliding at enemies at high speed.

EPalWazaID::Unique_CaptainPenguin_BodySl.description: Penking's exclusive skill. Lies on its belly while generating frozen air all around it before sliding at enemies at high speed.

EPalWazaID::Unique_ChickenPal_ChickenPec.description: Chikipi's exclusive skill. Flies at enemies in its sights, attacking them with its sharp beak.

EPalWazaID::Unique_DarkAlien_JumpScractc.description: Xenovader's exclusive skill. Swiftly pounces and slashes with its left hand.

EPalWazaID::Unique_DarkCrow_TelePoke.description: Cawgnito's exclusive skill. Teleports next to an enemy before attacking with its beak.

EPalWazaID::Unique_DarkMechaDragon_BeamS.description: Xenolord 's exclusive skill. Generates a high-output beam sword with the right hand and delivers two powerful slashes while moving at high speed.

EPalWazaID::Unique_DarkMechaDragon_Conve.description: Xenolord 's exclusive skill. Concentrates energy filled with darkness and releases it all at once in a straight line.

EPalWazaID::Unique_DarkMechaDragon_Funne.description: Xenolord 's exclusive skill. Summons the light of destruction from subspace and continuously fires it in all directions, burning everything in its sight to ashes.

EPalWazaID::Unique_DarkMechaDragon_SetFu.description: Xenolord 's exclusive skill. Generates four satellite-like wings with auto-attack functionality. These wings will automatically track and attack the enemy when the next attack is launched.

EPalWazaID::Unique_DarkMechaDragon_WarpC.description: Xenolord 's exclusive skill. Soars into the air at the speed of light and releases countless meteor projectiles. Afterwards, transforms into a comet and charges forward, causing a massive explosion upon impact.

EPalWazaID::Unique_DarkScorpion_Pierce.description: Menasting's exclusive skill. Jumps high and forcefully stabs its prey with its tail. The poison from the tail is deadly.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Deer_PushupHorn.description: Eikthyrdeer's exclusive skill. Charges at foes and uses antlers to launch them into the air. When used while riding, the direction of the charge can be controlled.

EPalWazaID::Unique_DrillGame_ShellAttack.description: Digtoise's exclusive skill. Moves while spinning its whole body at high speed. Drills through enemies, dealing continuous damage.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Eagle_GlidingNail.description: Galeclaw's exclusive skill. With talons outstretched, it glides forward in a ferocious charge.

EPalWazaID::Unique_ElecPanda_ElecScratch.description: Grizzbolt's exclusive skill. After leaping at an enemy and tearing at it twice with its electrically charged claws, it attacks the ground, sending an electric shock throughout the area.

EPalWazaID::Unique_ElecPanda_GatlingAtta.description: Grizzbolt's exclusive skill. Pulls out a minigun out of nowhere and starts blasting. Finishes with a single, charged power shot.

EPalWazaID::Unique_FairyDragon_FairyTorn.description: Elphidran's exclusive skill. Generates twin whirlwinds imbued with a mysterious power that pursues enemies.

EPalWazaID::Unique_FeatherOstrich_Tossin.description: Dazemu's exclusive skill. Accelerates all at once and dashes forward at high speed.

EPalWazaID::Unique_FengyunDeeper_CloudTe.description: Fenglope's exclusive skill. Charges forward while manipulating the atmosphere to create a pressurized wind tunnel around itself.

EPalWazaID::Unique_FengyunDeeper_Electri.description: Charges forward while manipulating the atmosphere and enveloping itself in thunderclouds.

EPalWazaID::Unique_FireKirin_Dark_DarkTo.description: Pyrin Noct's exclusive skill. Charges forward while engulfed in a veil of dark flames. Flames continue to burn in its path.

EPalWazaID::Unique_FireKirin_Tackle.description: Pyrin's exclusive skill. Charges forward while engulfed in a veil of flames. Flames continue to burn in its path.

EPalWazaID::Unique_FlameBuffalo_FlameHor.description: Arsox's exclusive skill. Takes aim and charges with fierce momentum while raising its horn.

EPalWazaID::Unique_FlowerDinosaur_Whip.description: Dinossom's exclusive skill. Uses its large tail to strike the ground in front of it, delivering a shockwave in a straight line.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Garm_Bite.description: Direhowl's exclusive skill. Swiftly leaps at an enemy and bites into them.

EPalWazaID::Unique_GhostAnglerfish_Fire_.description: Ghangler Ignis's exclusive skill. Lashes forward with the flaming lantern atop its head, sweeping broadly ahead.

EPalWazaID::Unique_GhostAnglerfish_Sweep.description: Ghangler's exclusive skill. Lashes forward with the lantern atop its head, sweeping broadly ahead.

EPalWazaID::Unique_GhostBeast_Tossin.description: Maraith's exclusive skill. While running slowly, it continuously launches flickering fireballs toward the enemy.

EPalWazaID::Unique_GoldenHorse_StoneDash.description: Gildane's exclusive skill. Charges forward, hurling rocks to the left and right with great force.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Gorilla_GroundPunch.description: Gorirat's exclusive skill. Pounds the ground twice before leaping into the air and delivers a powerful punch.

EPalWazaID::Unique_GrassPanda_Electric_E.description: Mossanda Lux's exclusive skill. Winds up its right arm before delivering an electrically charged punch.

EPalWazaID::Unique_GrassPanda_MusclePunc.description: Mossanda's exclusive skill. Winds up its right arm before striking an enemy with a devastating punch.

EPalWazaID::Unique_GrassRabbitMan_GrassR.description: Verdash's exclusive skill. While jumping forward, it sweeps the surroundings with a high-speed spinning kick.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Grassmammoth_Earthqua.description: Mammorest's exclusive skill. Uses its massive body to shake the earth, dealing damage over a wide area.

EPalWazaID::Unique_GrimGirl_BrutalMachet.description: Splatterina's exclusive skill. Teleports instantly and launches a slash. It then teleports above the enemy, drives its weapon into them, and unleashes a wave of dark energy.

EPalWazaID::Unique_HawkBird_Storm.description: Nitewing's exclusive skill. Generates a tornado ahead before soaring towards its target.

EPalWazaID::Unique_HerculesBeetle_Beetle.description: Warsect 's exclusive skill. Skewers enemies with its four sturdy horns.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Horus_FlareBird.description: Faleris' exclusive skill. After creating scorching tornadoes, it cloaks itself in hellfire and charges forward.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Horus_PerfectStorm.description: Faleris' exclusive skill. Generates multiple scorching tornadoes and charges forward while gliding. The tornadoes converge in the center and eventually merge into a single massive tornado.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Horus_Water_AquaStorm.description: Faleris Aqua's exclusive skill. After summoning a massive tornado, it envelops its body in water and charges forward.

EPalWazaID::Unique_IceCrocodile_SpitAtta.description: Munchill's exclusive skill. Coughs up three cold grenades kept undigested inside its body and lobs them at enemies. May occasionally spit out something more dangerous...?

EPalWazaID::Unique_IceDeer_IceHorn.description: Reindrix's exclusive skill. Charges at an enemy with antlers adorned in ice.

EPalWazaID::Unique_IceHorse_IceBladeAtta.description: Frostallion's exclusive skill. Dashes forward while concentrating frigid air around its wings, using them to slash enemies with icy blade.

EPalWazaID::Unique_IceNarwhal_JumpingHor.description: Whalaska's exclusive skill. Charges straight ahead and briefly submerges, then bursts high into the air to launch an attack. An ice-element explosion occurs upon emerging.

EPalWazaID::Unique_JetDragon_JumpBeam.description: Jetragon's exclusive skill. Illuminates its wings and fires innumerable beams as it flies towards the enemy. The beams explode on impact.

EPalWazaID::Unique_KingAlpaca_BodyPress.description: Kingpaca's exclusive skill. Leaps high into the air before smashing into an enemy with its chubby, massive body.

EPalWazaID::Unique_KingBahamut_AirCrash.description: Blazamut Ryu's exclusive skill. After a big jump, moves at high speed in the air, gathering strength to unleash a powerful punch.

EPalWazaID::Unique_KingBahamut_ArmSmash.description: Blazamut's exclusive skill. Raises and inflates its arms, then slams them together, causing a massive explosion in the surrounding area.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Kirin_LightningTackle.description: Univolt's exclusive skill. Generates bolts of lightning all around while charging at its target.

EPalWazaID::Unique_LeafMomonga_SomerSaul.description: Herbil's exclusive skill. After a brief moment of preparation, charges at the enemy at high speed, finishing with a flip.

EPalWazaID::Unique_LilyQueen_LilyHealing.description: Lyleen's exclusive skill. Restores health to all allies within range using the power of healing.

EPalWazaID::Unique_LilyQueen_WindBarrier.description: A skill exclusive to the Lilikin species. Surround yourself with a wind barrier, Returns the blade of wind to the attacking opponent.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Manticore_InfernoStri.description: Blazehowl's exclusive skill. With momentum, it pounces mercilessly on the enemy and causes an explosion of fire at the point of impact.

EPalWazaID::Unique_MoonQueen_IceMoonBlad.description: Selyne's exclusive skill. Fires three consecutive high-speed slashes imbued with the power of moonlight.

EPalWazaID::Unique_MoonQueen_MoonBeam.description: Selyne's exclusive skill. Stores energy in the moon on its back, then fires a crescent-shaped beam forward.

EPalWazaID::Unique_MoonQueen_MoonBlade.description: Selyne's exclusive skill. Fires two consecutive high-speed blades imbued with the power of moonlight.

EPalWazaID::Unique_MysteryMask_LifeSteal.description: Omasculs exclusive skill. Suddenly appears near the enemy, firmly restraining them with its arms, and absorbs the HP of the restrained enemy.

EPalWazaID::Unique_NaughtyCat_CatPress.description: Grintale's exclusive skill. Grins menacingly before leaping into the air and smashing foes with its body.

EPalWazaID::Unique_NightBlueHorse_DeathS.description: Starryon's exclusive skill. Confuses enemies with flickering steps and launches slashing attack with its sharp horns.

EPalWazaID::Unique_NightLady_FlameNightm.description: Bellanoir Libero's exclusive skill. With a graceful dance, conjuries expanding rings of fire, then unleashes eerie flames that seek the enemies.

EPalWazaID::Unique_NightLady_WarpBeam.description: Bellanoir Libero's exclusive skill. Disappears suddenly, then reappears while firing a barrage of beams. The beams spread like a beautiful flower in bloom.

EPalWazaID::Unique_NightLady_WarpBeam_St.description: Bellanoir's exclusive skill. Disappears suddenly, then reappears while firing a barrage of beams.

EPalWazaID::Unique_OctopursGirl_InkJet.description: Gloopie's exclusive skill. Releases smoke to conceal itself, then launches a surprise headbutt from the shadows.

EPalWazaID::Unique_PinkCat_CatPunch.description: Cattiva's exclusive skill. Chases after enemies, swinging both arms and delivering a flurry of punches.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Plesiosaur_LongBreath.description: Braloha's exclusive skill. From the base of its long neck to the tip of its snout, it gradually spreads the breath of grass element.

EPalWazaID::Unique_PoseidonOrca_TorrentL.description: Neptilius's exclusive skill. Rising slightly, it gathers water at its mouth, then sweeps a high-pressure stream vertically and horizontally three times. Fissures form at the swept locations, erupting with water.

EPalWazaID::Unique_PurpleSpider_SpiderRa.description: Tarantriss's exclusive skill. Spits out a ball of thread, entangling the target it hits. Then, rushes at full speed to the trapped target and delivers three slashing strikes to finish it off.

EPalWazaID::Unique_QueenBee_SpinLance.description: Elizabee's exclusive skill. Channels power into its staff, and unleashes it in a whirl.

EPalWazaID::Unique_RedArmorBird_TriplePe.description: Ragnahawk's exclusive skill. While flapping forward, it strikes with its beak to ignite fires in front, right, and left, causing a small explosion.

EPalWazaID::Unique_RobinHood_BowSnipe.description: Robinquill's exclusive skill. Takes aim while drawing its bow before releasing a powerful shot at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Ronin_Iai.description: Bushi's exclusive skill. Taking hold of the sword, it appears in front of an enemy in an instant and unleashes an ultra-fast sword draw attack.

EPalWazaID::Unique_SaintCentaur_OneSpear.description: Paladius' exclusive skill. Charges forward while enveloped in holy power with its spear thrust ahead. The shield in its other hand blocks all attacks during the charge.

EPalWazaID::Unique_SakuraSaurus_SideTack.description: Broncherry's exclusive skill. Turns sideways before tackling enemies in front of it, sending them flying into the air.

EPalWazaID::Unique_ScorpionMan_Uppercut.description: Prixter's exclusive skill. Closes the distance to the enemy at high speed, then swings its pincers upward with full force.

EPalWazaID::Unique_SheepBall_Roll.description: SheepBall's exclusive skill. Curls into a ball, rolling after any enemies in its way. Becomes dizzy and unable to move after the attack ends.

EPalWazaID::Unique_SifuDog_Counter.description: Dogen's exclusive skill. Adopts an aiki stance. While in this stance, nulify any incoming attack, instantly close in on the enemy, and counter with a full-forced palm strike.

EPalWazaID::Unique_SnowTigerBeastman_Sno.description: Bastigor's exclusive skill. Let out a mighty roar and leap into the air. Then, embed both arms into the ground to create a massive ice crack. Continue to channel power into the ground, ultimately causing a large explosion of ice energy

EPalWazaID::Unique_SnowTigerBeastman_Tra.description: Bastigor's exclusive skill. Stomps the ground, creating a fissure of ice ahead. Then, rapidly closes the distance and slashes with the right hand.

EPalWazaID::Unique_SoldierBee_NeedleLanc.description: Beegarde's exclusive skill. Charges at the enemy at high speed, delivering a final thrust with a spear.

EPalWazaID::Unique_StuffedShark_HiddenWe.description: Finsider's exclusive skill. Draws twin water blasters from its mouth, firing six shots alternately left and right, then finishes by combining both blasters to unleash one powerful shot.

EPalWazaID::Unique_TentacleTurtle_HydroS.description: Turtacle's exclusive skill. Uses jet-powered propulsion to spin rapidly and launch itself at the enemy.

EPalWazaID::Unique_ThunderBird_ThunderSt.description: Beakon's exclusive skill. First, it strikes the enemy's location with lightning. Then, while gliding forward, it drops lightning to the left and right.

EPalWazaID::Unique_ThunderDog_InazumaSho.description: Rayhound's exclusive skill. Summons lightning one after another in front, then charges forward at high speed through the gaps between the falling bolts.

EPalWazaID::Unique_ThunderDragonMan_Nume.description: Orserk's exclusive skill. Summons numerous thunder spears and hurls them at the enemy. The first spear is imbued with the power of lightning and explodes after a few seconds.

EPalWazaID::Unique_ThunderDragonMan_Thun.description: Orserk's exclusive skill. Summons a spear of lightning while leaping into the air before throwing it at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::Unique_TropicalOstrich_DashK.description: Palumba's exclusive skill. Dashes to build up speed, then launches a devastating airborne kick at its target.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Umihebi_Fire_FireWind.description: Jormuntide Ignis's exclusive skill. Letting out a roar, it charges toward the enemy, twisting its fire-covered body as it advances.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Umihebi_WindingTackle.description: Jormuntide's exclusive skill. Letting out a roar, it charges toward the enemy, twisting its water-covered body as it advances.

EPalWazaID::Unique_VolcanicMonster_Ice_I.description: Reptyro Cryst's exclusive skill. Raises its front legs and slams them into the ground, causing a frozen blast under its enemies. It simultaneously bombards them with snow balls from above.

EPalWazaID::Unique_VolcanicMonster_Magma.description: Reptyro's exclusive skill. Raises its front legs and slams them into the ground, causing a volcanic eruptions under its enemies. It simultaneously bombards them with volcanic bombs from above.

EPalWazaID::Unique_WeaselDragon_FlyingTa.description: Chillet's exclusive skill. Gathers a bit of strength and leaps forward. Always shuts its eyes tight in fear when landing.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Werewolf_Ice_SnowScra.description: WereWolf_Ice's exclusive skill. Leaps forward and attacks twice with vicious claws imbued with ice element.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Werewolf_Scratch.description: WereWolf's exclusive skill. Leaps forward and attacks twice with vicious claws imbued with dark energy.

EPalWazaID::Unique_WhiteDeer_HolyPillar.description: Celesdir's exclusive skill. After igniting a burst of holy light across a vast area ahead, it strides forward, radiating holy light around itself.

EPalWazaID::Unique_WhiteShieldDragon_Shi.description: Silvegis's exclusive skill. Deploys a shield in front that reduces all types of attacks, then charges forward, crushing the enemy.

EPalWazaID::Unique_WhiteTiger_Ground_Iro.description: Cryolinx Terra's exclusive skill. First, it strikes with its claws, followed by a second slash, and culminates with a powerful slash using its entire body. When swinging the claws, rocks are launched forward in a fan shape.

EPalWazaID::Unique_WhiteTiger_IceScratch.description: Cryolinx's exclusive skill. First, it strikes with its claws, followed by a second slash, and culminates with a powerful slash using its entire body. When swinging the claws, ice pillars are launched forward in a fan shape.

EPalWazaID::Unique_WingGolem_RoundCutter.description: Knocklem's exclusive skill. Takes a big swing and throws the ring from its back. The ring flies in a circular trajectory.

EPalWazaID::Unique_YakushimaBoss001_Smal.description: Demon Eye's exclusive skill. Charges at the enemy, bouncing off the ground or walls on impact.

EPalWazaID::Unique_YakushimaMonster001_S.description: Purple Slime's exclusive skill. Leaps toward the enemy and delivers an attack.
Red Slime's exclusive skill. Leaps toward the enemy and delivers an attack.
Green Slime's exclusive skill. Leaps toward the enemy and delivers an attack.
Illuminant Slime's exclusive skill. Leaps toward the enemy and delivers an attack.
Rainbow Slime's exclusive skill. Leaps toward the enemy and delivers an attack.
Blue Slime's exclusive skill. Leaps toward the enemy and delivers an attack.

EPalWazaID::Unique_YakushimaMonster002_S.description: Enchanted Sword's exclusive skill. Lunges forward to deliver a sharp thrust.

EPalWazaID::Unique_YakushimaMonster003_B.description: Cave Bat's exclusive skill. Using its whole body, it lunges at the enemy, bouncing off the ground or walls on impact.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Yakushima_EyeTossin.description: Eye of Cthulhu's exclusive skill. Repeatedly charges at the enemy.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Yakushima_MouthTossin.description: Eye of Cthulhu's exclusive skill. Repeatedly charges at the enemy at high speed.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Yakushima_SummonServa.description: Eye of Cthulhu's exclusive skill. Summons four Servants that charge at enemies to deal damage. Servants disappear after taking damage or after a short time.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Yeti_Grass_GrassBall.description: Wumpo Botan's exclusive skill. Rolls a ball made of grass as it moves forward, and when it grows large enough, it throws it to cause an explosion.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Yeti_SnowBall.description: Wumpo's exclusive skill. Rolls a snowball as it moves forward, and when it grows large enough, it throws it to cause an explosion.

EPalWazaID::WallSplash.description: Continously creates walls made from water columns at the enemy's location.

EPalWazaID::WaterBall.description: Creates a giant ball of water and hurls it at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::WaterGun.description: Hurls a ball of water straight at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::WindCutter.description: Fires a high speed blade of wind that flies straight at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::WindEdge.description: Launches sharp blades of air that fan out.
